price: Kada ku ci dukiyõyinku* a tsakãninku da ƙarya, kuma ku sãdu da ita zuwa ga mahukunta dõmin ku ci wani yanki daga dũkiyõyin mutãne da zunubi alhãli kuwa kũ, kuna sane.
arabic: وَلَا تَأۡكُلُوٓاْ أَمۡوَٰلَكُم بَيۡنَكُم بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتُدۡلُواْ بِهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡحُكَّامِ لِتَأۡكُلُواْ فَرِيقٗا مِّنۡ أَمۡوَٰلِ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: * Haramun ne cin dũkiyar mutãne da zãlunci. An haɗa wannan ãyã da ta gabãninta, ta azumi, dõmin haɗin hana ci da ya gama su. Sãduwa da mahukunta da dukiya, shi ne rashawa, Allah Yã la'ani mai bãyar da ita da mai karɓarta.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
